duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop, train, and coach School staff members for the effective delivery of educational programs.
Monitor and implement positive behavior strategies and regularly conduct observations in all classrooms.
Prepare for and maintain accreditation status and ensure the school operates with the most up-to-date curriculum/program expectations.
Lead family communication on all aspects of Company curricula and promote a positive image of the company.
Recruit, select, and retain quality staff and help achieve profitability for the company.

education_certification.credential: Minimum of an Associate’s Degree in Early Childhood Education, Early Elementary, or related field.
